columns.name: etag
columns.description: Gets the etag of the resource.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The creation time of the account.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: The last modified time of the account.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The status of account. Possible values include: 'AccountStateOk', 'AccountStateUnavailable', 'AccountStateSuspended'.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The SKU name of the account. Possible values include: 'SkuNameEnumFree', 'SkuNameEnumBasic'.

columns.name: sku_family
columns.description: The SKU family of the account.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: The SKU capacity of the account.
